wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Alfred Ward (6 August 1917 – after 1953) was an English footballer who scored 51 goals from 154 appearances in the Football League playing as a forward for Sheffield Wednesday and Darlington in the years following the Second World War.

link_mentions.page: List of Sheffield Wednesday F.C. seasons

response: Thomas or Tommy Ward may refer to:
*Tommy Ward (footballer, born 1913) (1913–1997), English football wing-half/forward, played for Port Vale and others in the 1930s
*Tommy Ward (footballer, born 1917) (1917–1992), English football forward, played for Sheffield Wednesday and Darlington in the 1940s/1950s
